p: The basic measure advised is to avoid places where an epidemic is spread. In case it is not avoidable, then a person advised to stay at a well-ventilated place, preferably distant from the ground. When interacting with a patient, care should be taken that the air currents may not be directed from a patient to a healthy person ( Razi, 1991). During epidemics, it is also advised to avoid unnecessary physical exertion ( Razi, 2008; Sina, 1878) and to stay in properly ventilated places with optimum temperature, neither too hot nor too cold ( Rushd, 1987).
